name: Dogrim
description:
You are teleported in the world of Dogrim. First You like this world, but it is very dangerous. You have the wish to go back to the Earth, but for this you must collect all diamonds in Dogrim.

You move with w,a,s,d and with e and q you rotate. You must collect in each level 12 diamonds to get to the next level. Avoid the enemies which are walking in the levels.
